<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Starstone Aspirants](/Articles.aspx?ID=29)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 70</row>

The Starstone at Absalom’s heart draws would-be deities from across the world. Learn about influential demagogues, strange cults... and spectacular failures!
